question: Which Genshin Impact 5.5 hidden achievement is obtained by interacting with Ixcatl, Xoctli, and Xona?

evidence.fact:
"The Murderer is… You!" is another achievement that can be obtained at the Collective of Plenty. All you have to do is interact with three different NPCs and pick specific dialogues during the conversation.

The first NPC is named Ixcatl and can be found east of the Obsidian Totem Pole at the location shown on the map above. While interacting with him, select the "Get Away?" prompt.

Then, go to another NPC named Xoctli, who can be found beside the entrance of the Collective of Plenty. Interact with him and pick the "Need any help?" prompt.

Lastly, look for Xona the Blacksmith, who can be found a little west of Xoctli. Talk to her and pick the "The fence here seems to be broken…" dialogue.
